entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
